meanings.definition: A person who makes something real or brings something into existence.
meanings.sent1: The realiser of the plan turned it into reality.
meanings.sent2: The realiser of the dream built a beautiful house.
meanings.sent3: The realiser of the magic trick amazed the audience.
meanings.sent4: She was the realiser of his deepest desires.
meanings.sent5: The realiser of the potion created a powerful elixir.

meanings.definition: A person who understands or becomes aware of something.
meanings.sent1: As a realiser of the situation, he knew what needed to be done.
meanings.sent2: The realiser of the problem quickly found a solution.
meanings.sent3: The realiser of the joke burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: She was the realiser of the hidden message in the painting.
meanings.sent5: The realiser of the mystery uncovered the truth.

meanings.definition: A person who achieves or fulfills something.
meanings.sent1: The realiser of his goals celebrated his success.
meanings.sent2: She was the realiser of her lifelong dream.
meanings.sent3: The realiser of the challenge overcame all obstacles.
meanings.sent4: He was the realiser of the team's victory.
meanings.sent5: The realiser of the prophecy proved it to be true.
